overview: Nancy is helping her stepson, Trevor, move into a house for college when they are cheerfully greeted by sweet Sophie, one of his new roommates. As the three of them chat and get to know each other, it's revealed that Sophie comes from a small town, is innocent. Her naivety is further revealed when she awkwardly reacts to Nancy being bisexual. It's time for this sheltered small-town college girl to expand her horizons.  Casey and her husband, Shane, are waiting for Shane's stepmother, Marilyn, to arrive. Shane's excited to see his stepmom, though Casey, on the other hand, is a little nervous about it. Whenever they're in the same room, it always seems like Marilyn is competing with Casey over Shane's attention.
title: A Time for Experementing
